channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Cette barre de son 2.1 avec DTS Virtual:X signée Xiaomi booste le son de votre TV pour moins de 170 €
item.description: Xiaomi a pensé aux budgets serrés en lançant sa barre de son Pro 2.1 ch, un modèle abordable qui est tout de même capable de simuler un son surround 3D. Actuellement, la marque la propose à 161,10 euros au lieu de 179 euros.

item.title: China’s brain-computer interface industry is racing ahead
item.description: China’s brain-computer interface industry is rapidly scaling from research to commercialization, driven by strong policy support, expanding clinical trials, and growing investor interest.

item.title: Xenoblade Chronicles X: Definitive Edition’s Switch 2 upgrade is wonderful, and could hint at Monolith Soft’s future on the console
item.description: Xenoblade Chronicles X’s Switch 2 Edition is legitimately definitive, and it could be a sign of things to come for Monolith Soft, its back catalog, and its future.

item.title: Trump says Netflix will ‘pay the consequences’ if it doesn’t fire Susan Rice
item.description: Donald Trump threatened that there would be "consequences" for Netflix if it didn't fire board member Susan Rice. Rice served in both the Obama and Biden administrations, and recently appeared on Preet Bharara's podcast, where she said corporations that "take a knee to Trump" are going to be "caught with more than their pants down. […]

item.title: ‘Face/Off 2’ Director Adam Wingard is Now/Gone
item.description: Does a new director for the 'Face/Off' sequel mean Wingard and co-writer Simon Barrett's idea for it is also DOA?

item.title: How to watch Winter Olympics Closing Ceremony 2026: FREE live streams, schedule, preview
item.description: All the ways to watch Winter Olympics Closing Ceremony 2026 live streams for FREE, as the action in Italy comes to an end

item.title: On est montés à bord de la Baojun Yunhai : la voiture électrique conçue par des fans via les réseaux sociaux
item.description: Dans l’univers impitoyable des véhicules électriques chinois, une nouvelle marque tente un coup audacieux. La marque Baojun de SAIC-GM-Wuling s’est attaché les services de Gong Jun, acteur vedette et phénomène pop asiatique, pour incarner son nouveau SUV électrique. Une voiture co-créée avec les fans qui ont pu donner leurs avis sur certaines fonctions. On a pu monter à bord, voici notre premier avis. ...

item.title: 6 days left to lock in the lowest TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 rates
item.description: Super Early Bird pricing for TechCrunch Disrupt 2026 ends February 27 at 11:59 p.m. PT. That means you have just 6 days left to secure up to $680 of ticket savings.

item.title: How a mature API management strategy can help eliminate agentic blind spots
item.description: Without governance and oversight, agentic AI will create security blind spots that derail AI initiatives.

item.title: Did someone wash their underwear in your hotel coffee machine? Bring a portable espresso maker, and you won't have to worry
item.description: A TikTok influencer claims a flight attendant taught her how to clean underpants in a hotel pour-over machine, and I'll never use one again.

item.title: Quordle hints and answers for Monday, February 23 (game #1491)
item.description: Looking for Quordle clues? We can help. Plus get the answers to Quordle today and past solutions.

item.title: NYT Connections hints and answers for Monday, February 23 (game #988)
item.description: Looking for NYT Connections answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, plus my commentary on the puzzles.

item.title: NYT Strands hints and answers for Monday, February 23 (game #722)
item.description: Looking for NYT Strands answers and hints? Here's all you need to know to solve today's game, including the spangram.
